title: Project yasuo is hated because of this reason
body: project yasuo e una skin molto bella, pero e odiata, perche ha la testa TROPPO grossa

replies.body: It's hated because if a Yasuo player has that skin he is a toxic flamer. 100% confirmed.
Do you know that this is the italian forum?
